list_name_not_provided: Please provide me a list name.
Please provide the name of the list you wish to create.
new_or_old_list_name_not_provided: Please make sure you provide the list name to rename and its new list name.
Please provide the list name to rename and its new list name.
list_does_not_exists: Sorry I can't because the "%list%" does not exist.
I cannot do that because the "%list%" does not exist.
list_already_exists: You already have a list named "%list%".
list_renamed: I renamed the "%old_list%" list to "%new_list%" list.
list_deleted: I deleted the "%list%" list and all the todos it contained.
todo_completed: I completed "%todo%" from your "%list%" list, congrats!
